review: Simple setup, great features, replaced my fire tv stick (wifi signal interference from other equipment.  I use it in a less RF intensive part of the house now.).  Daughter loves the voice control (what girl wouldn't?).  Price / feature ratio beat all other video streaming devices I looked at.  I connected  via ethernet  cable it to my home network.  Flawless video and high def sound with my HDTV (via HDMI) and Home theater receiver (via toslink optical cable).  Also streams content from Flash drive via USB.  Money well spent.
author: K.  Bassett

review: We ordered this a few months ago and signed up for the service. We don't watch a lot of TV but it is really nice to be able to watch only the channels we want and not have to deal with a lot of shopping channels and other channels that do not interest us. Wish we could get the Braves games - my guy's favorite team but overall very happy with this product.
